Room.Name: Ivanhouse Sporting Arena - Challenger's Ready Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Challenger's Ready Room, preparing for battle.
Room.LongDescription: All players must enter the Challenger's Ready Room before they can enter the main combat arenas. The large sporting facility supports a number of lower-level arenas where small groups of low level gladiators can challenge single monsters. There are three main arenas: The first is a low-level arena where less-experienced players may challenge a large gladiator. The other two are one-on-one arenas where you may challenge single gladiators in hand-to-hand, mortal combat.
